meta.title: DM Hero - Your D&D Campaign Companion
meta.description: The ultimate campaign management tool for Dungeon Masters. Track NPCs, locations, items, and sessions with powerful search and AI features.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.intro: Learn how to use DM Hero to manage your campaigns like a pro.

hero.subtitle: The ultimate campaign management tool for Dungeon Masters. Organize NPCs, locations, items, factions, and sessions with powerful fuzzy search and AI integration.

features.title: Everything You Need to Run Epic Campaigns
features.subtitle: DM Hero gives you all the tools to organize, search, and enhance your tabletop adventures

entities.title: Entity Management
entities.description: Organize NPCs, Locations, Items, Factions, Lore, Players, and Sessions. Everything interconnected with bidirectional relationships.

search.title: Powerful Fuzzy Search
search.description: Find anything instantly with FTS5 full-text search and Levenshtein distance. Search across ALL fields including linked entities.

linking.title: Entity Linking
linking.description: Use {'{{'}npc:123{'}}'}  syntax in Markdown to create clickable badges with hover previews. See connections at a glance.

calendar.title: In-Game Calendar
calendar.description: Track your campaign timeline with an absolute day system. Perfect for session notes and world events.

ai.title: AI Integration
ai.description: Generate NPC names with GPT and create character portraits with DALL-E. Bring your imagination to life.

local.title: Local-First & Private
local.description: All your data stays on your machine in SQLite. No cloud, no subscriptions, your campaign is truly yours.

chaos.title: Chaos Graph
chaos.description: Visualize entity relationships in an interactive force-directed graph. Discover hidden connections in your world.

markdown.title: Rich Markdown Editor
markdown.description: Write beautiful descriptions with full Markdown support, syntax highlighting, and live preview.

screenshots.title: See DM Hero in Action
screenshots.subtitle: A glimpse into your future campaign headquarters

download.title: Ready to Become a Hero?
download.subtitle: Download DM Hero and start organizing your campaigns today. Free, open source, and always will be.

testimonials.title: What People Are Saying
testimonials.subtitle: Don't just take our word for it - hear from DMs and developers who use DM Hero

feedback.title: Got Feedback or Ideas?
feedback.description: Found a bug? Have a feature idea? Want to share how you use DM Hero? Join the discussion on GitHub - no account needed to browse, but you can create one for free to participate!

support.title: Support DM Hero
support.description: DM Hero is completely free and open source - and always will be. I develop it in my spare time because I'm passionate about D&D and helping fellow Dungeon Masters.
support.whatIs: "Buy Me a Coffee" is a simple way to say thanks with a small donation. It helps cover hosting costs and motivates me to keep adding new features. No account needed, no subscription - just a one-time tip if you feel like it!
support.note: Every coffee fuels another late-night coding session. Thank you for your support!

footer.tagline: Empowering Dungeon Masters to tell epic stories.
footer.copyright: © {year} DM Hero. Open source under MIT License.

privacyBanner.title: Your data belongs to you.
privacyBanner.message: This website uses no cookies and no tracking. We only store what's technically necessary. No consent required.

imprint.title: Imprint
imprint.info: DM Hero - An Open Source Project
imprint.responsible: Responsible for content according to § 55 (2) RStV
imprint.note: We are not responsible for external links. Linked content was checked for obvious legal violations at the time of linking.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We take the protection of your personal data seriously. Below you will find information about how we handle your personal data when you visit our website.
privacy.controller: The responsible party within the meaning of the GDPR is:
privacy.name: Florian Heuberger
privacy.hosting: This website is hosted on a private server accessible via IONOS SE. The server may store technical data such as IP addresses in server log files. This data is used exclusively for technical monitoring and troubleshooting.
privacy.dataCollection: This website does not use cookies or tracking. No personal data is collected or stored by us. This is a purely static informational website.
privacy.legalBasis: Insofar as technical data is processed by the hosting provider, this is done on the basis of Art. 6 (1) lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in a functional website).
privacy.external: This website embeds external content: profile pictures from GitHub (github.com) for the testimonials section and an image from Buy Me a Coffee (cdn.buymeacoffee.com). When loading this content, your IP address may be transmitted to these providers.
privacy.github: The public GitHub API is used to display release information. Technical data may be transmitted to GitHub. GitHub's privacy policy applies.
privacy.rights: You have the right to request access to, correction or deletion of your personal data, to restrict processing, and to object to the processing of your personal data. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority.
privacy.note: Please note that data transmission over the Internet may have security vulnerabilities. Complete protection of data from access by third parties is not possible.
